attributes.action: Stop the government from sending migrants to Rwanda #StoptheShip
attributes.additional_details:
‘PM has announced the plans in a speech today. It has long been the government’s ambition to ‘offshore’ migrants. Other countries previously refused, but UK has made a deal with Rwanda.’
- Credit: UK Fact Check Politics

We need parliament to restrain the government from this heinous, inhumane and frightening new process which would endanger many and have far reaching consequences for decades to come.
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister has unveiled plans to send ‘illegal migrants’ who reach Britain to Rwanda. 

We need to stop the government from doing this immediately. Parliament must pass a bill forbidding this!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
